Author: sooomanykids
Text: My mum is the same and I donâ€™t live with her any more! She is always going on about how fat she is and how she needs to loose weight! I am just sitting there thinking well what do you think about me then!

Author: fishonthesun
Text: I'm sorry she is like that ): growing up my mom was always eating diet food and making negative comments about other people who gained weight and comparing me to friends of mine who were skinnier (even tho I was underweight and she knew I was underweight). I've had body dysmorphia as long as I can remember. Messed up eating habits, too. And a couple weeks ago she said she didnt think she had anything to do with my eating disorder and asked me if that was true. She's been a good mom overall and definitely not purposefully making me feel bad. I didnt have the heart to admit the ways she messed me up.
